column5: A wee bit of homesickness for the Blowes bros.  Best to you, b'ys.
I should have known better and done a search for the video on OFC before posting.  Best to all the noofs this season.
shhhhhhhhhh dont tell the newfs its a special time of year.....they wont know what to do with the rest of the year...

Missing home this year as well. My Mom and Dad are here which is good. I got a Painting  done by my cousin of two little lads robbing an apple tree for Xmas though. Brings back memories. Will miss the mummering and house parties this year for sure.  I will try and post it later if at all possible.
Myself,I have never had the honor of being part of a Mummering,but have heard it,s a great time.  They sure like thier drink.LOL  http://www.cbc.ca/landandseanl/
